item.title: program
item.description: Header LaTeX The editor converts LaTeX equations in double-dollars $$: $$ax^2+bx+c=0$$. All equations are rendered as block equations. If you need inline ones, you can add the prefix \inline: $$\inline p={1\over q}$$. But it is a good practice to place big equations on separate lines:
